title: Swap Course Sections
description: A student wants to swap from one section of a course to another section of the same course that fits their schedule better.

tasks.description: Identify the student and the course they wish to swap.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student is enrolled in 'ENGL101, Section 001'.

tasks.description: Check for availability in the desired section ('ENGL101, Section 005').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the target section has open seats.

tasks.description: Process the section swap in the SIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully drops the student from section 001 and adds them to section 005 in a single transaction.
